alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany County through 515 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Centennial, or 25 miles west of Laramie, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Woods Landing-Jelm, Lake Owen Campground, Lake Hattie Reservoir, Woods Landing, Lake Owen and Centennial. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range
